page.title: 10PORTLAND TERRACE
page.content: In the south east corner of the grid is situated the N.C.B. area workshops which service all machinery used in the area mines.Portland terrace is near to these workshops and these were built over 100 years ago. At one time they were the property of Ashington CO-OP and were occupied by employees as tennants. The present tennants starting at number 1 are Ms.Keech_Ms Combs_Ms Hindhaugh_Ms Lewins_Ms Mathews_Ms Chartlon_Ms Wylie_Ms Curry_Ms Bryson_Ms Hope.Near this terrace is a cottage called Abyssinia House
